title: Only One Naked
description: Ever obliging, Maisie agrees to run her aunt's quaint old bookshop while she's away. However, the lovely 22-year-old redhead soon gets strange requests from some of her customers - requests which bring out her latent exhibitionist tendencies. Whether it's modelling for an art class or meeting some senior citizens, her adventures always end with Maisie as the only one naked.If you love CFNF (Clothed Female, Nude Female) fun and the idea of one person naked in a crowd, then you'll relish Cassie Caine's sparkling, witty and highly explicit stories, featuring the first two of Maisie's adventures into solo nudity. Adults only. Features explicit sexual imagery. 11,000 words (two short stories)
author: Cassie Caine
